config.toggle-auto-casting.tooltip: Press this key to toggle automatic fishing rod casting.
config.enable-auto-baiting.tooltip: When enabled, automatically applies bait to the fishing rod when it runs out.
config.enable-grab-treasure.tooltip: When enabled, automatically collects items from treasure chests during fishing.
config.enable-skip-fish-showing.tooltip: When enabled, skips the animation of showing caught fish.
